properties.body:
SOUTH ATLANTIC.
SOUTH AFRICA TO GRENADA.
40 FOOT S/V ARTIC TERN THREE, WHITE HULL, ONE PERSON ON BOARD,
UNREPORTED CAPE TOWN TO GRENADA. LAST KNOWN POSITION VICINITY
14-44S 008-39W AT 271355Z DEC. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO USCG ATLANTIC AREA COMMAND CENTER,
PHONE: 757 398 6700, E-MAIL: LANTWATCH@USCG.MIL,
MRCC ANGOLA, MRCC CAPE TOWN OR CAPE TOWN RADIO.
